upload_file(local_path: str, destination_path: str = None, new_name: str = None) → Any[source]

Upload a file to Google Drive.

Args:

local_path: Path to the local file destination_path: Destination folder ID, folder name, or Google Drive URL (optional - uploads to root if None) new_name: Custom name for the uploaded file (optional - uses original filename if None)

Returns:

Dict containing file metadata including id, name, size, etc. :param destination_path:
